sections.title: New Features
sections.content: Major combat updates and system refinements.
list: Boss Levels: The Alien Boomer now appears every 10 levels with increasing health (+25 HP/level).
Energy Rewards: Defeating a boss grants +25% Max Energy capacity.
Passive Upgrades: Unlocks +5% Energy Capacity per level and +0.25% Energy Refill per kill after first boss defeat.

sections.title: Balance & Fixes
list: Fine-tuned early game difficulty for smoother progression.
Updated wave structure: Aliens spawn gradually with Calm/Intense moments.
Reduced difficulty in Dark Levels.
Adjusted spawn logic to reduce enemies appearing directly above/below ship.
Fixed scaling issues on smaller screens (Launcher/Login).

sections.title: Combat Systems
sections.content: New offensive capabilities authorized for all pilots.
list: Charged Shot Module: Hold SPACE to charge. Release a piercing beam that neutralizes multiple targets.
Combo Scoring: Efficiency bonuses awarded for multi-kills (20/30/etc).

sections.title: Visual Upgrades
sections.content: Enhanced rendering protocols for better situational awareness.
list: Dynamic Backgrounds: Improved depth and movement logic.
Alien Morphology: Distinct skins for movement patterns and bio-matter analysis (green blood effects).

sections.title: HUD Enhancements
sections.content: Cockpit interface updated with real-time feedback modules.
list: Resource Tracking: Immediate visual feedback for Score and Energy gains.
Audio Analysis: Active music track visualization on HUD.

sections.title: System Optimizations
sections.content: Engineering has deployed a series of hotfixes to improve system stability and pilot experience.
list: Corrected score saving management protocols
Resolved authentication anomalies (login/registration)
Recalibrated interface layout and typography spacing across various terminals

sections.title: Mission Briefing
sections.content: Welcome to the frontier, Commander. Initial systems are green.

sections.title: Dark Zone Warning
sections.content: Be advised: Long-range sensors will fail in Dark Waves. Visibility will be reduced to a narrow cone. Rely on visual confirmation for hostility engagement.

sections.title: Flight Mechanics
sections.content: The new engine core consumes ENERGY for high-g maneuvering and weapons fire. Monitor your reserves; a depleted ship is a dead ship.

sections.title: Hostile Intelligence
sections.content: Scanner data indicates new alien behavioral patterns:
list: Erratic evasion maneuvers detected
Swarm tactics observed in higher waves
Increased aggression from Hunter-class entities
